Class Shop

java.lang.Object
com.example.Shop
public class Shop extends Object
The Shop class manages the in-game shop functionality, including loading items from a JSON file, organizing items into categories, and handling purchasing and selling operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shop(String filePath)
    Constructs a Shop object and initializes items from a specified JSON file.

    Retrieves a list of items of a specific type.

    Processes the sale of an item.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shop

      public Shop(String filePath)
      Constructs a Shop object and initializes items from a specified JSON file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path of the JSON file containing item data

  • Method Details

    • getList

      public List<Item> getList(String type)
      Retrieves a list of items of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of items to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of items of the specified type, or an empty list if no items of that type are found

    • buy

      public void buy(Item item)
      Processes the purchase of an item. Updates the player's balance in the save file.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to purchase

    • sell

      public void sell(Item item)
      Processes the sale of an item.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to sell

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Retrieves the current balance of the player.
      Returns:
      the player's current balance

    • setSaveFile

      public void setSaveFile()
      Sets the save file reference and updates the current balance from the save file.
